meanings.definition: Wouldst: archaic second person singular form of 'would'
meanings.sent1: If thou wouldst listen, thou wouldst learn.
meanings.sent2: She wouldst always sing in the meadow.
meanings.sent3: If thou wouldst eat all the cookies, thou wouldst need more milk!
meanings.sent4: His heart wouldst dance like a leaf in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The old clock wouldst chime with a melancholy tone.

meanings.definition: Wouldst: used to express a wish or desire
meanings.sent1: I wouldst love to visit the beach this weekend.
meanings.sent2: They wouldst dream of flying high in the sky.
meanings.sent3: If I wouldst have a magic wand, I wouldst make all the chores disappear!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes wouldst sparkle like diamonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The flowers in the garden wouldst bloom endlessly in her presence.
